alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 20 at 9:37AM MST until August 20 at 11:15AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of South Central Arizona, including the following county, Pinal. * WHEN...Until 1145 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 935 AM MST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 2.5 inches of rain have fallen since 6 am. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Oracle, Saddlebrooke and Biosphere 2. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
